00039 {

00042 //--------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods

00049     public static function GetInstance ( )
00050     // User's manual :
00051     //Getter of the unique instance. Create this if doesn't exist

00060 
00061     public function OnLoad ( )
00062     // User's manual :
00063     //function to be called on ApplicationStart
00064         //
00065     // Contract :
00066     //
00067         {
00068                 parent::OnLoad();
00069                 
00070                 $appl = Application::GetInstance();
00071                 $DBVars = & $appl->GetVariables[ DB_ARRAY_INDEX ];
00072                 
00073                 // set up all 'always' needed connections
00074                 foreach ( $GLOBALS[ DB_ARRAY_INDEX ] as $key => $db )
00075                 {
00076                         if ( $db['alwaysUse'] && ! isset ( $DBVars[ $key ] ) )
00077                         {
00078                                 // set up
00079                                 $className = $db[ 'type' ].'Connection';
00080                                 $DBVars[ $key ] = new $className ( );
00081                                 
00082                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetServer( $db['host'] );
00083                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetUsername( $db['login'] );
00084                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetPassword( $db['password'] );
00085                                 
00086                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->Open( BDDConnection::CONNECTION_PERSISTENT );
00087                                 
00088                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetDatabase( $db['database'] );
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091                 
00092                 $className = $GLOBALS[ DB_ARRAY_INDEX ][ MYSQL_CONF_BASE ][ 'type' ].'TableVariable';
00093                 $configuration = new $className ( CONFIGURATION_TABLE_NAME, $DBVars[ MYSQL_CONF_BASE ], $errors );
00094 
00095                 $servConf = $configuration->SelectServerVariables();
00096                 $siteConf = $configuration->SelectSiteVariables( IDSITE );
00097                 
00098                 unset ( $configuration );
00099                 
00100                 if ( $siteConf InstanceOf Errors || $servConf InstanceOf Errors )
00101                 {
00102                         echo ( $siteConf . $servConf );
00103                 }
00104                 else
00105                 {
00106                         $conf = $servConf;
00107                         
00108                         foreach ( $siteConf as $siteVar )
00109                         {
00110                                 $conf->Add ( $siteVar );
00111                         }
00112                 
00113                         // load Server configuration
00114                         $appl->SetConfiguration( $conf );
00115                         
00116                         unset ( $conf );
00117                 }
00118                 
00119                 unset ( $servConf );
00120                 unset ( $siteConf );
00121 
00122                 $sessionsActivated = $appl->GetConfiguration()->GetVariableByName( SITE_SESSIONS_ACTIVATED );
00123                 
00124                 if ( ! ($sessionsActivated InstanceOf Errors) && $sessionsActivated->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA ) )
00125                 {
00126                         // activate sessions
00127                         Session::GetInstance();
00128                 }
00129                 
00130                 unset ( $sessionsActivated );
00131                 unset ( $appl );
00132         } //---- End of OnLoad
00133
